thread.title: BREAKING: Evacuation CHAOS as California dam FAILS putting thousands of lives at risk
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Evacuation CHAOS as California dam FAILS putting thousands of lives at risk

title: BREAKING: Evacuation CHAOS as California dam FAILS putting thousands of lives at risk
text:
BREAKING: Evacuation CHAOS as California dam FAILS putting thousands of lives at risk BREAKING: Evacuation CHAOS as California dam FAILS putting thousands of lives at risk AUTHORITIES have ordered residents who live near one of Americaâ€™s biggest dams to evacuate the area as the structure is expected to fail within the hour. PUBLISHED: 02:08,   02:15, Mon, Feb 13, 2017 REUTERS Oroville dam is expected to fail within the hour 
The emergency spillway of the Oroville Dam in northern California is severely eroded and people living downstream should leave immediately, officials have warned. 
Around 16,000 people who live in the town of Oroville and should head north towards Chico. 
Water began flowing into the emergency spillway at the dam on Saturday after heavy rainfall blasted the main spillway. 
More to follow...
